DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure blood levels of TXA in children having cardiac surgery which requires cardiopulmonary bypass. TXA is used to reduce bleeding during surgery. This study will help determine if the current dosing of TXA results in therapeutic blood levels.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Tranexamic Acid (TXA) in Children Undergoing Repair of Congenital Heart Defects Utilizing Cardiopulmonary Bypass
DOC.criteria: congenital heart disease requiring surgical repair with cardiopulmonary bypass children weighing over 20 kg family does not want to participate in the study
